channel.title: Cannot find the Path Specified errror
channel.description:
So ive looked into everything about this problem and it keeps occureing any suggestions on how to make it stop please? i want to run this compiler.... but it keeps bringing that us please help! =[
it also says the same thing when i do the .run.bat....

item.title: Cannot find the Path Specified errror
item.dc:creator: @Pazaz Pazaz
item.description:
@Pazaz wrote:

blackpanther0928:

are yall talking about JRE7? or talking about JDK1.7.0?

Both.
JRE = Java Runtime Environment
JDK = Java Development Kit
You’ll need both of them
(Uninstall All Java currently installed, Then install those.)

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot find the Path Specified errror
item.dc:creator: @blackpanther0928 blackpanther0928
item.description:
@blackpanther0928 wrote:

i open the project16 v.6
click on compile
comes up in green

“The system cannot find path specified”
“Press any key to continue”

Enviromental Variables
User variables

CLASSPATH=CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%
PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin

System Variables
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot find the Path Specified errror
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[/quote][quote=“blackpanther0928, post:4, topic:418192”]Still cant find path specified =[[/quote]

[quote=“unh0ly, post:5, topic:418192”]I Just explained what to do.
Figure it out…[/quote]
So did I…

[quote=“Vengpwe, post:6, topic:418192”]Have you set Enviromental Variables?

Please post what you got in your compiler in quote and write your java path, then I could fix it for you.[/quote]
You don’t have to set your Enviromental Variables for it to work, but it is helpful.

item.title: Cannot find the Path Specified errror
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javaC.exe”

That’s the path to your Java.

Start > Computer > OS (C:) < Program Files > Java > Jdk version > Bin > JavaC.exe

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot find the Path Specified errror

item.title: Cannot find the Path Specified errror
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Ill give you easy steps to follow,

  1. Right click compiler
  2. Hit edit
  3. Change the path going to your javac to yours on your computer.
  4. Done, just repeat for all compilers.

Read full topic
